title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS),Follow-up Form A1: Subject Demographics
description:
NOTE: This form is to be completed by intake interviewer per ADC scheduling
records, subject interview, medical records, and proxy informant report (as needed). 
For additional clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for
Follow-up Visit Packet, Form A1. Check only one box per question.

BIRTHMO.title: 1A Subject’s month of birth
BIRTHMO.description: (1 – 12), Date can be submitted as MM. BIRTHMO is available to all researchers upon request.

BIRTHYR.title: 1B Subject’s year of birth
BIRTHYR.description: Date can be submitted as YYYY.1875 to (current year minus 15)

LIVSIT.title: 3 What is the subject’s living situation?

LIVSITX.title: 3A Living situation, other – specify
LIVSITX.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).Blank if #3, LIVSIT ≠ 5 (Other).

INDEPEND.title: 4 What is the subject’s level of independence?
enum: 2 Requires some assistance with complex activities
3 Requires some assistance with basic activities

RESIDENC.title: 5 What is the subject’s type of residence?

RESIDENX.title: 5A Type of residence, other – specify
RESIDENX.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“),ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #5, RESIDENC ≠ 5 (Other).

ZIP.title: 6 Subject’s primary residence zip code (first 3 digits)
ZIP.description: Must be valid zip code, in the range 006 – 999.ZIP is available to all researchers upon request.

MARISTAX.title: 7A Marital status, other – specify
MARISTAX.description: Any text or numbers but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“),ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%).Blank if #7, MARISTAT ≠ 8 (Other).

LIVSIT.title: 3 What is the subject’s living situation?

INDEPEND.title: 4 What is the subject’s level of independence?

RESIDENC.title: 5 What is the subject’s type of residence?

ZIP.title: 6 Subject’s primary residence zip code (first 3 digits)
